metadata.title: HIJONES Women's Thin Solitaire Princess Cut CZ Diamond Engagement Ring Wedding Band
features: Three colors: white, gold and rose gold
description: Stainless steel ring from HIJONES lasest collection will add a strength and cool look to you. Why choose Stainless Steel? Stainless Steel Jewelry does not tarnish and oxidize, which can last longer than other jewelries. It's one of the most bio-compatible metals and able to endure a lot of wear and tear. It is amazingly hypoallergenic. It does not need special care. Such advantages make it become popular accessory.The Pendant is packed in a beautiful velvet gift pouch and then placed into special jewelries package. It can be gift for birthday,wedding,holiday,celebration,travel etc to your lovers and friends.
